metadata.title: CVE-2016-3923 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Accessibility services in Android 7.0 before 2016-10-01 mishandlemotion events, which allows attackers to conduct touchjacking attacks andconsequently gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug30647115.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
